title: BRING BACK URF & DOOM BOTS
body: Plz Riot we want URF and Doom bots back and able to be played again.

replies.body: holy **f**uck stop asking for urf back, it's so goddamn obvious that they'll bring it back for april fools this year.

"we"

You're not the voice of the whole player base.
atleast have the decency not to spam boards
urf doombots confirmed. lux doombot firing lasers every 10 seconds gg

urf i understand, but doom bots? don't get me wrong was a fun game mode while it lasted but like many of the other game types it was just a thing to change things up and would not have the fun base to run continuously
